Show / Hide Table of Contents

    Class WaitForSpineAnimationEnd

    Use this as a condition-blocking yield instruction for Unity Coroutines. The routine will pause until the AnimationState.TrackEntry fires its End event.

    See the Spine Unity Events documentation page and for more information on when track events will be triggered.

    NowWaitFor(TrackEntry)

    One optimization high-frequency YieldInstruction returns is to cache instances to minimize GC pressure. Use NowWaitFor to reuse the same instance of WaitForSpineAnimationComplete.

    Declaration
